title: The One Eyed Barnstormer Who Invented the Space Suit in the 1930s
author: Today I Found Out
comment: Thanks to Magic Spoon for sponsoring today’s video! Build your own variety box here → https://magicspoon.thld.co/brainfood_0821 and use code BRAINFOOD to get $5 off today!
The Castle at the Smithsonian has one of Wiley's helmets on display as recently as 2019. I was thrilled to see it as it truly is one of the stepping stones to modern aviation.

A one-eyed barnstormer married a Texas oilman's daughter.....legend!
One-Eyed Barnstormer will be the name of my country band.
This guy deserves his own Biographics video!🛩️

With my grandad spending some time as a barnstormer and being raised in Oklahoma, I was well aware of Wiley Post and Winnie May and that he and Will Rogers died in an air accident in Alaska.  However, your team dug much up of his history I was never aware of.  Thanks.
Wow one hell of a story. So basically this guy was a genius taught himself Math and how to fly with one eye. Genius without motivation or a goal is nothing. Truly inspirational
